jobDescriptions: Developed custom Shopify themes using Liquid and React.js.
Improved accessibility compliance by implementing ADA standards.
Maintained and scaled e-commerce platform features.
Automated tests for a Flutter mobile app using WebdriverIO (TypeScript).
Integrated test suites into CI/CD pipeline (Azure DevOps).
Executed manual test cases and reported defects.
Promoted to Junior Backend Developer after 6 months for outstanding performance.
Developed REST APIs with Express.js and NestJS.
Managed PostgreSQL/MariaDB databases and deployed to AWS.
Trained in Agile/SCRUM and Git version control.
